title: Issue while building pango: "error: *** Could not enable any backends."
body:
While building paraver package I get:

```
# pango is one of the dependency of paraver:
$ spack install -v pango@1.40.3

checking for CAIRO... yes
checking which cairo font backends could be used... none
configure: Disabling cairo support
configure: error: *** Could not enable any backends.
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/home/guest/workarena/softwares/sources/spack/var/spack/stage/pango-1.40.3-kvtho5ewie7qvcradoffwhuyswntkbqz/pango-1.40.3/configure' '--prefix=/home/guest/workarena/softwares/sources/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.1/pango-1.40.3-kvtho5ewie7qvcradoffwhuyswntkbqz' '--without-xft'
/home/guest/workarena/softwares/sources/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/autotools.py:268, in configure:
     260      def configure(self, spec, prefix):
     261          """Runs configure with the arguments specified in
     262          :py:meth:`~.AutotoolsPackage.configure_args`
     263          and an appropriately set prefix.
     264          """
     265          options = ['--prefix={0}'.format(prefix)] + self.configure_args()
     266
     267          with working_dir(self.build_directory, create=True):
  >> 268              inspect.getmodule(self).configure(*options)
```
